note:
Datacide is a magazine that covers experimental electronic music, from the avant-garde to hard dance music, its intersections with radical politics and counterculture, in-depth political and historical analysis and critique, reviews of records and books, as well as experimental fiction, poetry and visual works.
Datacide is a critical voice in the increasingly irrational and rightward lurching ‘posttruth’ times of conspiratorial world views and identity politics.
